abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33939121, pmid33464672, pmid33244593, pmid33419891, pmid32772069, pmid33893618, pmid33905546, pmid33900384, pmid33755376, pmid33910996
